CSSPrimitiveValueGetFloatValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The getFloatValue() method of the
interface is used to get a float value in a specified
unit. If this CSS value doesn't contain a float value or can't be converted into the
specified unit, a is raised.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSPrimitiveValueGetFloatValue.returns: A float value in the specified unit.
